starfleet_message: To Captain Picard, USS Enterprise-D: A distress call has been received from a Federation science station orbiting Epsilon IV.
mission_description: Investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team.

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, sensors show activity consistent with the situation described: investigate the distress call and ensure the safety of the science team. What are your orders?

options.label: Proceed with the mission as planned
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Acknowledged, Captain. Executing your orders now.'

options.label: Hold position and gather more data
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Understood. We'll continue monitoring and report changes immediately.'

options.label: Alert Starfleet Command of developments
options.crew_reply: Lt. Worf: 'Transmitting report to Starfleet, Captain.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, I've analyzed the readings. Would you like me to run a deeper scan or maintain current observation protocols?

options.label: Proceed with the mission as planned
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Acknowledged, Captain. Executing your orders now.'

options.label: Hold position and gather more data
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Understood. We'll continue monitoring and report changes immediately.'

options.label: Alert Starfleet Command of developments
options.crew_reply: Lt. Commander Data: 'Transmitting report to Starfleet, Captain.'

dialogue_tree.line: Captain, shall we proceed according to Starfleet orders or await further confirmation?

options.label: Proceed with the mission as planned
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Acknowledged, Captain. Executing your orders now.'

options.label: Hold position and gather more data
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Understood. We'll continue monitoring and report changes immediately.'

options.label: Alert Starfleet Command of developments
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Transmitting report to Starfleet, Captain.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends your decisive actions in completing the mission with honor.
The Enterprise-D’s performance has been exemplary; your leadership ensured mission success.
Federation interests are secure, and your actions are noted as a model for future operations.
Starfleet has expressed gratitude for your precision and adherence to protocol.
Mission accomplished flawlessly. All objectives have been completed without loss.
Starfleet regrets to report that mission objectives were only partially achieved.
Command expresses concern over the operational delays encountered during the mission.
The incident will be reviewed to prevent future procedural lapses.
Federation assets sustained avoidable risk; Starfleet will analyze mission conduct.
Mission failure acknowledged. Starfleet stresses the importance of improved readiness.

options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Understood. We'll continue monitoring and report changes immediately.'

options.label: Alert Starfleet Command of developments
options.crew_reply: Commander Riker: 'Transmitting report to Starfleet, Captain.'

debriefs.text: Starfleet Command commends your decisive actions in completing the mission with honor.
The Enterprise-D’s performance has been exemplary; your leadership ensured mission success.
Federation interests are secure, and your actions are noted as a model for future operations.
Starfleet has expressed gratitude for your precision and adherence to protocol.
Mission accomplished flawlessly. All objectives have been completed without loss.
Starfleet regrets to report that mission objectives were only partially achieved.
Command expresses concern over the operational delays encountered during the mission.
The incident will be reviewed to prevent future procedural lapses.
Federation assets sustained avoidable risk; Starfleet will analyze mission conduct.
Mission failure acknowledged. Starfleet stresses the importance of improved readiness.
